edu.wpi.grip.core

Interface Operation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CVOperation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlurOperation, ConvexHullsOperation, DesaturateOperation, FilterContoursOperation, FilterLinesOperation, FindBlobsOperation, FindContoursOperation, FindLinesOperation, HSLThresholdOperation, HSVThresholdOperation, MaskOperation, MatFieldAccessor, MinMaxLoc, NewPointOperation, NewSizeOperation, NTPublishOperation, PublishVideoOperation, PythonScriptOperation, ResizeOperation, RGBThresholdOperation, ThresholdOperation

    public interface Operation
    The common interface used by Steps in a pipeline to call various operations. There is usually only one instance of any class that implements Operation, which is called whenever that operation is used.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default java.util.Optional<?> createData()
      Override this to provide persistent per-step data
      InputSocket<?>[] createInputSockets(com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus eventBus) 
      OutputSocket<?>[] createOutputSockets(com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus eventBus) 
      java.lang.String getDescription() 
      default java.util.Optional<java.io.InputStream> getIcon() 
      java.lang.String getName() 
      default void perform(InputSocket<?>[] inputs, OutputSocket<?>[] outputs) 
      default void perform(InputSocket<?>[] inputs, OutputSocket<?>[] outputs, java.util.Optional<?> data)
      Perform the operation on the specified inputs, storing the results in the specified outputs.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        The unique user-facing name of the operation, such as "Gaussian Blur"

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns:
        A description of the operation.

      • getIcon

        default java.util.Optional<java.io.InputStream> getIcon()
        Returns:
        An InputStream of a 128x128 image to show the user as a representation of the operation.

      • createInputSockets

        InputSocket<?>[] createInputSockets(com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus eventBus)
        Parameters:
        eventBus - The Guava EventBus used by the application.
        Returns:
        An array of sockets for the inputs that the operation expects.

      • createOutputSockets

        OutputSocket<?>[] createOutputSockets(com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus eventBus)
        Parameters:
        eventBus - The Guava EventBus used by the application.
        Returns:
        An array of sockets for the outputs that the operation produces.

      • createData

        default java.util.Optional<?> createData()
        Override this to provide persistent per-step data

      • perform

        default void perform(InputSocket<?>[] inputs,
                     OutputSocket<?>[] outputs,
                     java.util.Optional<?> data)
        Perform the operation on the specified inputs, storing the results in the specified outputs.
        Parameters:
        inputs - An array obtained from createInputSockets(EventBus). The caller can set the value of each socket to an actual parameter for the operation.
        outputs - An array obtained from createOutputSockets(EventBus). The outputs of the operation will be stored in these sockets.
        data - Optional data to be passed to the operation

      • perform

        default void perform(InputSocket<?>[] inputs,
                     OutputSocket<?>[] outputs)
